description: This table contains no-add single item information for the Plan of Care (POC) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status, such as active or soft-deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: POC_CREATED_IN_DTTM
columns.description: This item contains the instant at which the POC was created.

columns.name: POC_REFRESHED_DTTM
columns.description: This item contains the instant at which the POC was last refreshed with up-to-date patient info.

columns.name: POC_LAST_SAVED_DTTM
columns.description: This item contains the instant at which the POC was last saved with user-entered information.

columns.name: POC_COMPLETED_DTTM
columns.description: This item contains the instant at which the POC was filed and/or sent.

columns.name: PLAN_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the POC type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Plan Of Care


Plan Of Care Update

columns.name: UPDATE_POC_ID
columns.description: This item contains a pointer to the POC being updated.

columns.name: EPISODE_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the parent POC sequence number.

columns.name: UPDATE_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the child POC sequence number.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This item contains the link to the episode in which the POC was created.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the care plan contact that contains the care plan information pulled into the POC.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the POC contains care plan visit information, problems, or both.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Visit Data


Problem Data


Both Visit and Problem Data

columns.name: POC_MEDS_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the patient contact that contains the medications list for the POC.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date the record was created.

columns.name: EPSD_ELECTION_DATE
columns.description: The date of hospice election.

columns.name: EPSD_EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The date the hospice agency began taking care of the patient.

columns.name: TRIAGE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's triage code, as documented in the episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: POC_START_DT
columns.description: Start date for a hospice plan of care.  The plan of care is effective until the next POC/POC update's start date.

columns.name: POC_END_DT
columns.description: Virtual item which returns the end date of a hospice plan of care.  This is determined based on other plans of care (and, sometimes, the episode discharge date).  Typically a hospice plan of care will end whenever a subsequent plan of care is created.  A plan of care update will end when a subsequent plan of care update is created.

columns.name: POC_CODE_STATUS
columns.description: The patient code status when the plan of care is completed.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NM
columns.description: This item contains the display name for a plan of care.

columns.name: STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the current status of a plan of care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Draft


Completed


Signed


Revising


Revised


Addending


Addended


Deleted

columns.name: SPOC_WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the type for the current plan. This may be useful for classification and reporting upon different types of plans.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Dialysis


Social Care Client and Service Plan


Outpatient Rehab


Behavioral Health Treatment Plan


Hospice Plan of Care


Rehab Team Conference


Care Plan Meeting


Skilled Nursing Certification


Hospice Non-Covered


Home Health Plan of Care


Agreements

columns.name: SPOC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of plan a POC represents within a given workflow


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Comprehensive


Update


Client Plan


Service Plan


Plan of Care and IDG Update


Plan of Care


IDG Update


Certified Home Health


Certified Home Health - Resumption of Care


Certified Home Health - Supplemental


Child Custody


Child Support

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: This item contains the patient ID for whom the current plan has been created.

columns.name: SPOC_SIGNED_DATE
columns.description: The date the last required participant signed the plan.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_YN
columns.description:
This item is true if a plan is a template agreement.  Template agreements are not agreements for any particular patient, but are used, temporarily, to contain information used to create multiple agreements which may be on different patients.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TEMPLATE_POC_ID
columns.description: This item links an agreement to the template agreement from which it was copied.

columns.name: POC_RATIFIED_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the instant at which the POC was ratified.

columns.name: POC_RATIFIED_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates if the agreement is ratified or not.  A blank value indicates that no decision has been made.  A value of 1 (true) indicates that the agreement is ratified.  A value of 2 (false) indicates that a decision was made to not ratify the agreement.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PLAN_UNDER_REVIEW_YN
columns.description:
Whether the hospice POC is under review. While under review the POC cannot be signed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TEMPLATE_YN

columns.name: CODE_STATUS_CMT
columns.description: The patient code status comment when the plan of care is completed.

columns.name: HH_ASMNT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the assessment contact used to populate the home health Plan of Care.

columns.name: HH_CERT_PER_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the encounter that created the certification period associated with the home health Plan of Care.

columns.name: POC_AUTO_CREATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the Plan of Care has been automatically created. 'Y' Indicates that this Plan of Care was automatically created. 'N' or NULL indicate that it was manually created.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TEMPLATE_YN

columns.name: HH_POC_CONVERTED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the home health Specialty Plan of Care record corresponds to an old plan and was created out of the conversion.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TEMPLATE_YN
